SubVI Methods

Requires: VI Scripting

Inherits from Node. View the class hierarchy.

MethodDescription
InlineInlines the subVI into its calling VIs. Details
Relink To VIAfter the connector pane pattern of a subVI changes, re-links the subVI to the calling VI. LabVIEW uses the new connector pane pattern and attempts to reconnect any existing wires to the new pattern. This method then returns a reference to the re-linked subVI. Details
